rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0001
rows.name: Thank you all for coming today.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0002
rows.name:
We present to you our play 'Should the 
Kingdom of Invidia Declare War?'

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0003
rows.name: Oh, this should be fun!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0004
rows.name:
Are we the only ones watching?
Where has Nia gone?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0005
rows.name: I dunno...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0006
rows.name:
Queen Lagert!
We should go to war with Superbia!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0007
rows.name: That's quite abrupt, War Minister.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0008
rows.name: My lady...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0009
rows.name: Nia, you're good!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0010
rows.name:
Shut up!
I'm not doing this because I want to!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0011
rows.name: Ahem, this is not sudden at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0012
rows.name:
We've been making preparations
ever since Superbia
occupied Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0013
rows.name: So, the preparations are complete?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0014
rows.name:
We're still working on preparations,
but they'll be completed quite soon.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0015
rows.name:
Superbia is attempting
to conquer other nations besides Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0016
rows.name:
We must not allow any more
of these outrages.
We should declare war immediately.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0017
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0018
rows.name:
Very well then.
Let's declare war.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0019
rows.name: Wait one moment please!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0020
rows.name: What is it? High Minister.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0021
rows.name:
The Divine Beast of Superbia
is becoming so barren that crops
can no longer grow there.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0022
rows.name:
Meanwhile, our land is fertile.
Our Grana is also delicious.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0023
rows.name:
We only need to wait,
and the Superbian Empire will collapsen
from famine.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0024
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0025
rows.name:
No, no, if we wait,
they'll just add more vassal states
like Gula.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0026
rows.name:
If they gain more vassal states,
they'll become even more formidable.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0027
rows.name:
Then, even if Superbia's Divine Beast
collapses, defeating the Superbian Empire
would be very difficult.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0028
rows.name: However, there's no need to be hasty.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0029
rows.name:
They still haven't acquired enough
territory or supplies to sustain
their entire population.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0030
rows.name:
That's because Gula alone isn't enough
to support all of Superbia's population.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0031
rows.name:
So it shouldn't be too late
to act after waiting
for Superbia to weaken.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0032
rows.name: That makes sense...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0033
rows.name: However, this won't happen anytime soon.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0034
rows.name: It might take decades, or even centuries.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0035
rows.name:
The Superbian Empire is definitely
something we need to eliminate.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0036
rows.name:
I agree with that point,
but now is the time for patience.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0037
rows.name:
War preparations may be in progress,
but still not in optimal condition!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0038
rows.name:
At this point, Your Majesty,
we need you to make the decision.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0039
rows.name: What? I'm the one who has to decide?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0040
rows.name: Well, you're the one acting as the Queen.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0041
rows.name: Hmm, I guess so...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0042
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0043
rows.name: Let's go to war!

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0044
rows.name: Let's wait a little longer.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0047
rows.name: Huh? Why aren't you two saying anything?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0048
rows.name:
The script of
'Should the Kingdom of Invidia
Declare War?' ends at this point.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0049
rows.name: Therefore, thank you all for watching.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0050
rows.name: I see, I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0051
rows.name:
So they want children to watch
this play and consider what
Invidia should do for themselves.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0052
rows.name: That's a rather clever approach.

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0053
rows.name:
It's a complex issue
that might lead to divided opinions
even among the children...

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0054
rows.name:
I was dragged into this performance
and it just ends like that!?

rows.label: kizunatalk020_msg0055
rows.name: This isn't satisfying at all!?
